titleStmt.title: S. Johannis apostoli & evangelistæ, Epistolæ catholicæ tres, Arabice & Æthiopice: omnes ad verbum in Latinum versæ, cvm vocalium figuris exactè appositis. Quò studiosæ juventuti accessus ad hasce linguas expeditior, culturaque earundem uberior conciliarertur

licence.p: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

monogr.title: S. Johannis apostoli & evangelistæ, Epistolæ catholicæ tres, Arabice & Æthiopice: omnes ad verbum in Latinum versæ, cvm vocalium figuris exactè appositis. Quò studiosæ juventuti accessus ad hasce linguas expeditior, culturaque earundem uberior conciliarertur

imprint.publisher: Ex officina Johannis & Danielis Elsevier. Academ. Typograph.

biblStruct.note: Contains the three Epistles of John, in Arabic with Latin translation, facing the Ethiopic with Latin translation. The Arabic is identical with Erpenius' New Testament, cf. {https://biblia-arabica.com/bibl/BGHR4MDJ}

body.bibl: Nissel, Johann Georg, and Theodorus Petraeus, eds. S. Johannis apostoli & evangelistæ, Epistolæ catholicæ tres, Arabice & Æthiopice: omnes ad verbum in Latinum versæ, cvm vocalium figuris exactè appositis. Quò studiosæ juventuti accessus ad hasce linguas expeditior, culturaque earundem uberior conciliarertur. Leiden: Ex officina Johannis & Danielis Elsevier. Academ. Typograph., 1654.
